title: 'Nifty Island' Is Already Better Than Most NFT Sandbox Games
description: PREVIEW: Our first hands-on playtest of Nifty Island’s public beta was surprisingly addicting, allowing tons of room for imagination.

title: Fidelity’s spot Ethereum ETF decision deferred by SEC
description: The unfolding narrative in the cryptocurrency sector took a dramatic turn as the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) decided to delay its verdict on Fidelity’s proposed spot Ethereum ETF. Originally earmarked for a January 20, 2024, decision, the SEC has now pushed the deadline to March 5, 2024. This move has sent ripples through the […]

title: China’s crypto space thrives in laundromats and cafes despite the ban
description: Thursday’s Wall Street Journal (WSJ) report details how crypto users in China are conducting transactions in commonplace locations in order to circumvent the country’s prohibition on cryptocurrencies. According to sources with knowledge of the transactions that the WSJ quoted, traders convene in public areas, including snack kiosks, cafés, and launderettes in order to exchange wallet […]

title: A look at the reasons behind today’s crypto dip
description: Today’s cryptocurrency landscape presents a curious study, with the overall market cap experiencing a dip to $1.67 trillion. It’s not just a blip on the radar; it’s a window into the complex interplay of factors driving the crypto market. Bitcoin has seen its dominance inch up by 0.25% to 48.85%. The buzz around spot exchange-traded […]

title: Good News for Crypto Investors? South Korea Might Scrap Tax on Gains
description:
South Korea’s Ministry of Economy and Finance suggests discussing crypto taxation alongside traditional investments in the National Assembly. Potential scrapping of the virtual asset tax, initially planned for January 2025, could exempt crypto investors from a 22% tax on income exceeding 2.5 million won. South Korea’s top financial regulator maintains its stance of not recognizing […]

The post Good News for Crypto Investors? South Korea Might Scrap Tax on Gains appeared first on Coin Edition.
